title: Looking to start an Esports Organisation :: Looking for help!
body: Hey, I'm looking to start a League of Legends organisation, and I'm looking for someone to help me who has already managed an organisation in the past. Please email me at : tommy.van@hilarious.com, if you are willing to help me. Much appreciated thank you.

replies.body:
It's cool you're interested it getting into the eSports space, but this isn't a great pitch!

If I'm an experienced eSports person, you need to give me something to get excited about!

What's the vision? What do you want to build? Why? Sell sell sell
